Package org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs

Class LoadProfileEstimators

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.costs.LoadProfileEstimators
  • public class LoadProfileEstimators
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities to deal with LoadProfileEstimators.

      • baseContext

        public static final Context baseContext
        Base Context that provides several functions for estimation purposes.

    • Method Detail

      • createFromSpecification

        public static LoadProfileEstimator createFromSpecification​(java.lang.String configKey,
                                                           Configuration configuration)
        Creates an LoadProfileEstimator via a specification that is retrieved from a Configuration.
        Parameters:
        configKey - to look up the specification
        configuration - provides the specification and caches the LoadProfileEstimator
        Returns:
        the LoadProfileEstimator or null if no specification was found

      • createFromSpecification

        public static NestableLoadProfileEstimator createFromSpecification​(java.lang.String configKey,
                                                                   java.lang.String specification)
        Creates a new instance from a specification String. Valid specifications are as follows: 
             {"type":<*juel*, org.apache.wayang.core.util.mathex.mathex>,
      "cpu":<mathematical expression>,
      "ram":<mathematical expression>,
      "disk":<mathematical expression>,
      "network":<mathematical expression>,
      "import":<["optional", "operator", "properties"]>,
      "in":<#inputs>,
      "out":<#outputs>,
      "p":<correctness probability>,
      "overhead":<overhead in milliseconds>,
      "ru":<resource utilization mathematical expression>
      }
        The JUEL expressions accept as parameters in0, in1 a.s.o. for the input cardinalities and out0, out1 a.s.o. for the output cardinalities.
        Parameters:
        configKey - the Configuration from that the spec was retrieved or else null
        specification - a specification that adheres to above format
        Returns:
        the new instance

      • createFromJuelSpecification

        public static NestableLoadProfileEstimator createFromJuelSpecification​(java.lang.String configKey,
                                                                       WayangJsonObj spec)
        Creates a new instance from a specification String. Valid specifications are as follows: 
             {"cpu":<JUEL expression>,
      "ram":<JUEL expression>,
      "disk":<JUEL expression>,
      "network":<JUEL expression>,
      "import":<["optional", "operator", "properties"]>,
      "in":<#inputs>,
      "out":<#outputs>,
      "p":<correctness probability>,
      "overhead":<overhead in milliseconds>,
      "ru":<resource utilization JUEL expression>
      }
        The JUEL expressions accept as parameters in0, in1 a.s.o. for the input cardinalities and out0, out1 a.s.o. for the output cardinalities.
        Parameters:
        configKey - the Configuration from that the spec was retrieved or else null
        spec - a specification that adheres to above format
        Returns:
        the new instance

      • createFromMathExSpecification

        public static NestableLoadProfileEstimator createFromMathExSpecification​(java.lang.String configKey,
                                                                         WayangJsonObj spec)
        Creates a new instance from a specification String. Valid specifications are as follows: 
             {"cpu":<mathematical expression>,
      "ram":<mathematical expression>,
      "disk":<mathematical expression>,
      "network":<mathematical expression>,
      "import":<["optional", "operator", "properties"]>,
      "in":<#inputs>,
      "out":<#outputs>,
      "p":<correctness probability>,
      "overhead":<overhead in milliseconds>,
      "ru":<resource utilization mathematical expression>
      }
        The JUEL expressions accept as parameters in0, in1 a.s.o. for the input cardinalities and out0, out1 a.s.o. for the output cardinalities.
        Parameters:
        configKey - the Configuration from that the spec was retrieved or else null
        spec - a specification that adheres to above format
        Returns:
        the new instance

      • estimateLoadProfile

        public static <T extends ExecutionOperator> LoadProfile estimateLoadProfile​(OptimizationContext.OperatorContext operatorContext,
                                                                            LoadProfileEstimator estimator)
        Estimate the LoadProfile for an OptimizationContext.OperatorContext using a LoadProfileEstimator for the corresponding ExecutionOperator.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the ExecutionOperator that is in the OptimizationContext.OperatorContext
        Parameters:
        operatorContext - the OptimizationContext.OperatorContext
        estimator - the LoadProfileEstimator for the ExecutionOperator
        Returns:
        the LoadProfile

      • nestUdfEstimator

        public static void nestUdfEstimator​(java.util.Optional<LoadProfileEstimator> mainEstimatorOpt,
                                    FunctionDescriptor functionDescriptor,
                                    Configuration configuration)
        Utility to nest the LoadProfileEstimator of a FunctionDescriptor.
        Parameters:
        mainEstimatorOpt - an optional LoadProfileEstimator; should be a NestableLoadProfileEstimator
        functionDescriptor - whose LoadProfileEstimator should be nested
        configuration - provides the UDF LoadProfileEstimator
